challenge.title: Bruce Bagemihl - Biological Exuberance - Animal Homosexuality and Natural Diversity
challenge.description: Bruce Bagemihl's Biological Exuberance - Animal Homosexuality and Natural Diversity is a book that anthologizes sexual diversity in nonhuman animals, arguing that homosexuality is as natural as nature.
challenge.instructions: Read Bruce Bagemihl's Biological Exuberance - Animal Homosexuality and Natural Diversity on Archive.org.
